original_text: The Lord said to me, ‘Those prophets say that they speak my messages, but they are telling lies. I did not send them. I did not give them my authority. I did not give them any messages. They are deceiving people with the visions that they talk about. When they prophesy about things, it means nothing. They only speak about their own foolish ideas. The Lord said to me, ‘Those prophets say that they speak my messages, but they are telling lies. I did not send them. I did not give them my authority. I did not give them any messages. They are deceiving people with the visions that they talk about. When they prophesy about things, it means nothing. They only speak about their own foolish ideas. The Lord said to me, ‘Those prophets say that they speak my messages, but they are telling lies. I did not send them. I did not give them my authority. I did not give them any messages. They are deceiving people with the visions that they talk about. When they prophesy about things, it means nothing. They only speak about their own foolish ideas.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 선지자들이 내 이름으로 거짓 예언을 하도다 나는 그들을 보내지 아니하였고 그들에게 명령하거나 이르지 아니하였거늘 그들이 거짓 계시와 점술과 헛된 것과 자기 마음의 거짓으로 너희에게 예언하는도다

sentences.original_text: Those prophets say that they speak my messages
sentences.korean_translation: 그 선지자들이 내 메시지를 전한다고 말한다

sentences.original_text: I did not give them my authority
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 내 권위를 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: I did not give them any messages
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 어떤 메시지도 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They are deceiving people with the visions
They only speak about their own foolish ideas
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 오직 자신들의 어리석은 생각들에 대해서만 말한다
